articles.description: The CERT-In has issued a new advisory against a set of newly discovered WhatsApp vulnerabilities that allow attackers to remotely execute code on affected devices.
articles.content: WhatsApp users have been cautioned about new vulnerabilities detected in the popular instant messaging app that could lead to the breach of sensitive information. The CERT-In (Indian Computer Emergen… [+1589 chars]

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2021 Event: Samsung To Launch Most Powerful Galaxy Yet on April 28, 2021 - ZEE5 News
articles.description: Samsung is yet again ready with another product that will be revealed later this month. The South Korean tech giant has officially confirmed that it will be hosting a Galaxy Unpacked 2021 event on April 28, 2021.
